analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/42/0xbad5b99fe15acea44a9fcf823258af25eebc1648.sol:
	Contract EWBToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/42/0xbad5b99fe15acea44a9fcf823258af25eebc1648.sol#220-221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/42/0xbad5b99fe15acea44a9fcf823258af25eebc1648.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/42/0xbad5b99fe15acea44a9fcf823258af25eebc1648.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/42/0xbad5b99fe15acea44a9fcf823258af25eebc1648.sol#91) is not in mixedCase
